## updateHeaders() function

Creates a new response with the extra headers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function updateHeaders<B>(resObject: ResponseObject<B>, extraHeaders: OutgoingHttpHeaders): ResponseObject<B>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  resObject | <code>ResponseObject&lt;B&gt;</code> | The response to add the new headers to |
|  extraHeaders | <code>OutgoingHttpHeaders</code> | HTTP response headers |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ResponseObject<B>`

New repsonse with the extra headers
